paper_title: Graph embeddings with no Hamiltonian extensions
abstract: We show that extending an embedding of a graph $Γ$ in a surface to an embedding of a Hamiltonian supergraph can be blocked by certain planar subgraphs but, for some subdivisions of $Γ$, Hamiltonian extensions must exist.
publication_venue: 6 pages, 2 figures; to appear in Bull. of the Inst. of Comb. and its Appl
